Package MWC.GUI.Tools.Swing

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MyMetalToolBarUI.ToolbarOwner
    embedded interface for objects which are capable of owning a toolbar this is needed for MDI interfaces when it is not clear which document owns the various toolbars
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MyBasicToolBarUI
    A Basic L&F implementation of ToolBarUI.
    MyMetalToolBarUI
    A Metal Look and Feel implementation of ToolBarUI.
    RepeaterButton
    repeat button code, taken from KIWI library The author may be contacted at: frenzy@ix.netcom.com
    SwingMenuItem
    extension of normal Swing menu to create a menu item containing a Debrief tool item
    SwingToggleButton
    extension of Swing button, to create one which implements one of our Debrief tools
    SwingToolbar
    implementation of toolbar using Swing controls Swing
    SwingToolbarButton
    extension of Swing button, to create one which implements one of our Debrief tools
